# [Interview #1121: Brandon Sanderson Book Signing at JordanCon 8, Entry #15](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1121#15)

#### Question

When did you start writing?

#### Brandon Sanderson

First book was around 15. It was terrible.
